ygData.subject: Pottery
ygData.msgSnippet: I was wondering if anyone out there has tried pottery yet?  I m a level 11 cleric with 50 trains saved up and had heard that eventually with pottery you can
ygData.messageBody:
I was wondering if anyone out there has tried pottery yet? I'm a
level 11 cleric with 50 trains saved up and had heard that eventually
with pottery you can make armor molds. This would be really nice
because our guild smith wouldn't have to buy molds. So if you have
any info on pottery please share or if you've seen any guides on a web
page that would be nice too since I haven't found any on EQvault and
Stratics.

Tetasha Silvermoon of the Order of Deus Vult on Innoruuk
